text: "Not Afraid" is a 2010 hip hop song by the American rapper Eminem, and is the first single from his seventh studio album Recovery, which was released in April 27, 2010. The song was written by Eminem, Boi-1da, Luis Resto, J. Evans and M. Burnett. The song is about how Eminem tried to overcome the troubles in his life from the past few years and mainly his drug addiction and rehabilitation. Category:2010 songs Category:Eminem songs
title: Not Afraid
